newsitem.title: POLAND: FORECAST - Polish 3-month WIBOR seen at 18.66 end-97.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST - Polish 3-month WIBOR seen at 18.66 end-97.

text.p: The Warsaw Interbank Offered Rate (WIBOR) for three-month deposits is expected to ease to 18.66 percent by the end of the year from 22.53 percent on Monday, a Reuter poll of Poland's 24 biggest banks showed.
The prediction is a mean average of banks' forecasts ranging from 17.00 percent to 20.60 percent.
Last month, banks saw the rate at 18.51 percent on average at the end of 1997.

Banks expected the rate to ease to 18.25 percent in February 1998 with a range of predictions from 16.0 to 20.60 percent against 22.32 percent on average seen this month with a range from 21.60 to 22.8 percent.
